title: Cant login to EU west server. (but can login to other servers like, nordic.)
body:
Is EU west server down or something ? wtf. 

I cant login to EU west server, but can login to nordic & east... 

''Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.''

I get this message everytime I try to login to EU west. 

Does it matters where you live?


M8s, help me pls!

replies.body: There weren't any issues or maintenance that would have prevented players from logging into EUW.  If you're still having this issue then your network might be having problems connecting to our authentication server.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a resolution.  Let me know if you have any questions.
But i can play on EU nordic ? so it cant be the network? or can it ?
